title: Festive WILD-erland at Mandai Wildlife Reserve
blurb: Christmas comes alive in the WILDEST way this year end!
description: Experience the magic of Christmas at Mandai Wildlife Reserve with an enchanting 8-metre tall Christmas Tree, spotlighting threatened animal species. Immerse yourself in festive celebrations from day to night, enjoying family activities and wildlife encounters. Witness the magical transformation at dusk! Explore Bird Paradise, Rainforest Wild ASIA, and Curiosity Cove with the Destination Pass. Enjoy a festive celebration with family activities, wildlife encounters, and magical transformations. Discover the wonders of nature and create lasting memories this holiday season. Perfect for families and wildlife enthusiasts.
keyword_tag: Christmas, wildlife, family activities, Bird Paradise, Rainforest Wild ASIA, Curiosity Cove
